entry.title: topghostly/glyph-cms: Glyph CMS is a lightweight, API-driven CMS for creating and managing blog content with a rich text editor. It provides structured JSON output, supports images, lists, and links, and offers an optional pre-styled component library for easy integration. 🚀

entry.title: khyatish14/bottom-sheet-stepper: A lightweight and customizable stepper component for React Native, built on top of @gorhom/bottom-sheet. Easily manage multi-step flows in a modal bottom sheet with smooth animations and full control.

entry.title: SadiqVali786/safe-actions-state: A lightweight, type-safe utility for Next.js server & client actions with built-in auth, RBAC, Zod validation, auto retries, and real-time toast feedback. Just write your DB logic & zod schema, for your server action, we handle validation, auth, errors, retries & UI feedback seamlessly out of the box. No extra code, just focus on your logic! 🚀
entry.content: A lightweight, type-safe utility for Next.js server & client actions with built-in auth, RBAC, Zod validation, auto retries, and real-time toast feedback. Just write your DB logic & zod schema, for your server action, we handle validation, auth, errors, retries & UI feedback seamlessly out of the box. No extra code, just focus on your logic! 🚀

entry.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
entry.content: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
